title: Fully Equipped Kitchen with Breakfast Bar in This Studio Apartment

'show contact info', 'x388', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'For a charming Denver home filled with convenient features, choose this studio model now available at Grammercy Apartments.', 'You’ll find everyday cooking easy with a fully equipped galley kitchen with a breakfast bar.', 'Storage is simple with linen and walk-in closets available.', 'For consistently comfortable interiors, the apartment has individually controlled heating and cooling.', 'Some homes also have fireplaces.', 'Wood-inspired flooring throughout the home gives it a touch of classic style.', 'Accent walls offer inspiration for your apartments’ interior design and color theme.', 'Outside your door, walkways, trimmed lawns, and full-grown trees give the community a park-like feel, ideal for life with pets.', 'Amenities such as a swimming pool, a fitness center, and a clubhouse help enhance your lifestyle.', 'A TV lounge and a business center are available.', 'This controlled-access community has a laundry facility and an electronic locker system as well.', 'Call now for lease terms, pricing, and availability.', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:30pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:30pm',
